```r
library(classifyLLM)
library(dplyr)
Sys.setenv(OPENAI_API_KEY = "<your_key>")

tibble::tibble(text = c("latte", "sencha", "ristretto")) |>
  mutate(label = classify_llm(text, c("coffee","tea")))
```
